name: AdswizzSDKPrivacyDataMotion
summary: Requester implementation for the Motion system permission (your app requires the HealthKit capability)
description:
AdswizzSDKPrivacyDataMotion is an optional framework which provides support for the motion system permission.
See Apple's document on user privacy for details of available authorisations at https://developer.apple.com/documentation/uikit/core_app/protecting_the_user_s_privacy
